One of the core game modes was basically thrown out because it was "too hard to balance", the PvE mode was scrapped and unscrapped over and over until now a handful of missions exist for a separate cost, when they were supposed to be free (and the entire reason for the game existing in the first place). This game is a sad husk of what the original was.

Also, notice how they only ever announce that a character is part of some marginalized group (Usually LGBTQ+) when they're back in hot water for something *really* bad.
